chapters.title: Chapter 37: The Last Battle
chapters.info: Lord Captain Alaabar Harnesh, p. 648—A Child of the Light. His shadowed head is missing its left ear. He stood with Asunawa. He is bald, and grew up in Murandy. Many things try his patience, in Galad's estimation. He takes command should Galad fall; he is one of Galad's best soldiers.
